ninja.postoffice.common

Class MailImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.postoffice.common.MailImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mail

    public class MailImpl
extends Object
implements Mail
    Simple implementation of Mail. Does nothing special. In particular it does NOT validate any content.
    Author:
    rbauer
